00002 /*! zcovector=zcovector operator */
00003 inline zcovector& zcovector::operator=(const zcovector& vec)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] zcovector::operator=(const zcovector&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010   if(Array!=vec.Array){ // if it is NOT self substitution
00011     copy(vec);
00012   }
00013   return *this;
00014 }

00021 /*! zcovector+=zcovector operator */
00022 inline zcovector& zcovector::operator+=(const zcovector& vec)
00023 {
00024 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00025   std::cerr << "# [MARK] zcovector::operator+=(const zcovector&)"
00026             << std::endl;
00027 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00028   
00029 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00030   if( L!=vec.L ){
00031     std::cerr << "[ERROR] zcovector::operator+=(const zcovector&)" << std::endl
00032               << "These two vectors can not make a sumation." << std::endl
00033               << "Your input was (" << L << ") += (" << vec.L << ")."
00034               << std::endl;
00035     exit(1);
00036   }
00037 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00038   
00039   for(long i=0; i<L; i++){ Array[i]+=vec.Array[i]; }
00040   
00041   return *this;
00042 }

00073 /*! zcovector+zcovector operator */
00074 inline _zcovector operator+(const zcovector& vecA, const zcovector& vecB)
00075 {
00076 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00077   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator+(const zcovector&, const zcovector&)"
00078             << std::endl;
00079 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00080   
00081 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00082   if(vecA.L!=vecB.L){
00083     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(const zcovector&, const zcovector&)"
00084               << std::endl
00085               << "These two vectors can not make a sumation." << std::endl
00086               << "Your input was (" << vecA.L << ") + (" << vecB.L << ")."
00087               << std::endl;
00088     exit(1);
00089   }
00090   
00091 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00092   
00093   zcovector newvec(vecA.L);
00094   for(long i=0; i<newvec.L; i++){
00095     newvec.array[i] =vecA.Array[i]+vecB.Array[i];
00096   }
00097   
00098   return _(newvec);
00099 }

00102 /*! zcovector-zcovector operator */
00103 inline _zcovector operator-(const zcovector& vecA, const zcovector& vecB)
00104 {
00105 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00106   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator-(const zcovector&, const zcovector&)"
00107             << std::endl;
00108 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00109   
00110 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00111   if(vecA.L!=vecB.L){
00112     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator-(const zcovector&, const zcovector&)"
00113               << std::endl
00114               << "These two vectors can not make a subtraction." << std::endl
00115               << "Your input was (" << vecA.L << ") - (" << vecB.L << ")."
00116               << std::endl;
00117     exit(1);
00118   }
00119 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00120   
00121   zcovector newvec(vecA.L);
00122   for(long i=0; i<newvec.L; i++){
00123     newvec.array[i] =vecA.Array[i]-vecB.Array[i];
00124   }
00125   
00126   return _(newvec);
00127 }

00130 /*! zcovector^T*zcovector operator (inner product) */
00131 inline std::complex<double> operator%(const zcovector& vecA, const zcovector& vecB)
00132 {
00133 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00134   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator%(const zcovector&, const zcovector&)"
00135             << std::endl;
00136 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00137   
00138 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00139   if(vecA.L!=vecB.L){
00140     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator%(const zcovector&, const zcovector&)"
00141               << std::endl
00142               << "These two vectors can not make a dot product." << std::endl
00143               << "Your input was (" << vecA.L << ") % (" << vecB.L << ")."
00144               << std::endl;
00145     exit(1);
00146   }
00147 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00148   
00149   std::complex<double> val( zdotu_( vecA.L, vecA.Array, 1, vecB.Array, 1 ) );
00150   
00151   return val;
00152 }
